explains: v. 用石墨涂（或掺入等）
wordGroup: expanded graphite n. 膨胀石墨
nodular graphite 球状石墨铸铁
spheroidal graphite cast iron 球墨铸铁
graphite bearing （离合器分离的）石墨轴承
graphite mould 石墨模子，石墨模具；石墨模
graphite block 石墨块，石墨砖

sentences.en: Made from cast iron, it is finished in graphite enamel.
sentences.cn: 该物由铸铁制成，表面以石墨搪瓷抛光。

sentences.en: Graphite is a highly efficient conductor of electricity.
sentences.cn: 石墨是一种高效的电导体。

sentences.en: A powerful electric current is passed through a piece of graphite.
sentences.cn: 一股强大的电流被传导经过一块石墨。
